data.eml:eml: The province of Zuid-Holland lies in the west of the Netherlands and borders the North Sea. The provincial capital is Den Haag and its largest city is Rotterdam. Zuid-Holland is one of the world's most densely populated and industrialised regions. The province covers an area of 3,403 square kilometres and has 3,607,000 inhabitants.Positive observations without protocolDataset available via https://www.ndff.nl/english / serviceteamndff@natuurloket.nl895,249 records (March 2018)
